title: Pressed accept, but never made it to champion select?
body:
I recently dodged a game due to me not getting into champion select.

Like no joke: http://prntscr.com/dr9peo

It says i'm in champion select but I wasn't in it.

I want my 2 lp back :(

replies.body: When you're in queue and hit accept, your network needs to transition you over to the same room as anyone else but something seems to be leaving you behind.  I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection and get in.  While we can't restore LP or game stats, that will hopefully prevent further occurrences.  Let me know if that clears things up!
